pattern.name: Duplication ratio
pattern.description:
Proportion of records with a duplicate value.
Note: It's different from concentration pattern.
pattern.example: Is the customer a man of one taste or an explorer?
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT t1.@base , COALESCE(Sum(t2.nrow)/t1.nrow, 0) AS @columnName FROM ( SELECT @base , Count(*) AS nrow FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @base ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , Count(*) AS nrow FROM @propagatedTable GROUP BY @base, @column HAVING Count(*) >= 2 ) t2 ON t1.@baseId = t2.@baseId AND t1.@baseDate = t2.@baseDate GROUP BY t1.@base, t1.nrow
